description: Submodel designed for encapsulating all screwing-related operations and metrics.

submodelElements.description: SMC for containing all depth-related properties

value.description: Refers to the length of the screw measured in milimeters (mm).

submodelElements.description: SMC for containing all torque-related properties

value.description: The required torque value applied during the tightening process, measured in Newton-meters.

submodelElements.description: SMC designed for containing all screwing points

value.description: Collection containing the point's important features
Collection designed to specify the safe area of screwing using the bit's length and diameter
Length of the area of screwing
Diameter of the area of screwing
Coordinate of screw in the X axis
Coordinate of screw in the Y axis
Coordinate of screw in the Z axis
